knimeNode.name: Pick Image Peaks (Deprecated)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Picks image peaks, i.e. local maxima.

fullDescription.intro:
Picks image peaks, i.e. local maxima. The result is that this is a fairly simple, (hopefully) fast peak-picker, but it is accurate only for strict peaks, that is, peaks that have no neighbors of equal value.
This picker does no pre-processing, so it may be advisable to smooth your peak image before using this. Deprecated: Use Maximum Finder instead.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: If true, the maxima in a local radius are suppressed, except the highest one.
Sets the peak suppression region to a spheroid of radius r.
